    • Constructor Detail

      • WarGame

        public WarGame(Deck deck,
               mainUI ui)
        a creator that accepts one deck and a ui. The deck is split into 2 for use in the game.
        Parameters:
        deck - a deck
        ui - the ui that the game will be played from

        ui - the ui that the game will be played from
